title: Hedge Funds Cut Bullish Gold Wagers to Lowest in 15 Weeks
description: Money managers slashed their bullish wagers on gold to the lowest since October as the precious metal suffered its biggest price plunge in more than a decade last week.
content: Money managers slashed their bullish wagers on gold to the lowest since October as the precious metal suffered its biggest price plunge in more than a decade last week.
